attributes.action: make Banger Racing an Olympic sport.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Banger Racing is a vast and Popular sport in many, many Countries. 
Banger Racing as a Sport encourages the younger generation to vent their frustrations on a legalized track, rather than terrorize the public highways and byways.
The encouragement of this sport will also reduce the volume of abandoned vehicles on our streets, and will help our greener issues as vehicles will need to be  stripped in accordance to out current environmental standards.
Banger Racing has been a major national sport in this country for over 40 years, but still it has the least coverage.
